name: Enter Battle V1
description:
A short undertale battle with a creature called an "Enter."

Here it is, once again another UT battle. Ive decided to completely remake the engine and start from scratch.

CONTROLS -

Arrow keys to move.

1,2,3,4 to select FIGHT, ACT, ITEM, and MERCY.

Click the options on the act menu.

Press Z to continue through text.

Move for orange, stop for blue.

(Item options will be added soon!)

Feel free to report any bugs, glitches, or exploits in the comments.

Credits:

Scripting by: Me

Character and Attack art and by: Me

Character belongs to me.

Undertale was made by Toby Fox.

Music was made by Toby Fox.

FIGHT, ACT, ITEM, and MERCY menu buttons, and slice animation belongs to toby fox.

Sound effects  belong to Toby Fox.
